title: Spacey Unmasked
overview: Spacey UnmaskedÂ will look at Kevin Spacey's life, from his emergence on Broadway and meteoric rise to stardom through to his fall from grace amidst multiple allegations of grooming, sexual harassment and abuse.It will also follow the outcomes of two upcoming cases: a civil case brought by Spacey's first public accuser, Anthony Rapp, which will be heard in New York in October; and the criminal case in the UK, where Spacey stands accused of several crimes.
